transcript.title: Appointment of Secretary, Department ofÂ Human Services and Health
transcript.content:
The Government will shortly be recommending to the Governor-General theÂ appointment of Professor Stephen Duckett as Secretary to the Department ofÂ Human Services and Health.

Stephen Duckett, 44, is Professor of Health Policy and Dean of the Faculty ofÂ Health Sciences at La Trobe University, a position he has held sinceÂ November 1993.

Professor Duckett is an economist with a Masters degree and a PhD in healthÂ administration from the University of New South Wales. He is a Fellow of theÂ Australian College of Health Service Executives.

Between 1983 and 1993, Professor Duckett held senior positions in theÂ Department of Health and Community Services in Victoria, including asÂ Director, Acute Health Services, and Director, Policy and Planning. FromÂ 1974 to 1983, he was on the academic staff of the School of HealthÂ Administration and the University of New South Wales.

On behalf of the Government, I would like to express appreciation for theÂ valuable contribution made by Mr Tony Cole, the outgoing Secretary to theÂ Department of Human Services and Health.

The Government will recommend that Professor Duckett's appointment takeÂ effect on Monday, 14 November, 1994.

ADELAIDE
7 October, 1994
